replies.body: But minion block is OP. Plus free doran's shield passive.

{{champion:74}}  - Passive literally gives all allies nearby health regen. Note this doesn't affect him and he is a solo lane champion. The health regen it grants his turrets is near pointless as they will likely be one shot. 
{{champion:96}} - While it isn't entirely useless it doesn't make sense for a long range hypercarry to be killed only for his corpse to run at you into melee range. It just doesn't fit.
{{champion:61}} - Again not a worthless passive just a bit odd. Increased damage on consecutive autos isn't something that makes to much sense thematically with Orianna. 
{{champion:35}} - Crits on backstabs however passive becomes worthless if you were to crit normally as the passive would tick however no bonus damage.
{{champion:134}} - Passive is great once you max out a spell however you have no passive until level 9. 
{{champion:72}} -Great for jungling and epic monsters however in lanes you have no passive. Along with this you can see a spire change color on the map when it's taken alerting you of a players location should the capture one.
ori passive is what makes her a lane bully

Orianna's passive is meant to encourage her to actually engage the enemy and not just slap them with her ball from half the lane away. Kind of like Lux and Xerath's passives. In order to get your full damage potential/not run oom you actually have to auto the enemy.
